Translations.Text: mux thang sxng khx ngxabi la hab cng phinas læa khea k phinas læw
thraphysmbati khxng khea læa sing thi khea di khwnkhway wi nan midi xanwy prayochn kæ khea ley
khea ca kheapi phea him nı nrk thi mi fi luk chon
thang phriya khxng khea dwy nang pen phu bæk fun
thi khx khxng nang mi cheuxk thak dwy yı xinthphlam
